title: (chore) release v3.4.0-rc6
(bug) autoupdate for android prompt for RC again
(bug): Password reset doesn't work in the iOS app.
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

I get an error message every time. See screenshot below.

NOTE: The account I used for this test is @ JakePassi.

NOTE: Canary mode is turned on.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Log out.
2. Press "Forgot Password?"
3. Enter your username.
4. Press "CONTINUE".
5. Press the link in the email.
6. Enter a new password which meets the requirements.
7. Re-enter the password.
8. Press "CONTINUE"

### Platform information

iPhone SE / iOS 12.1.4

### App version

iOS app (Version 3.3.0)

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Password reset doesn't work in the iOS app.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Password reset should work in the iOS app.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![10](/uploads/37053b02a2ada5577e87b4f700baef9b/10.jpg)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: (bug): Pressing the globe icon at the bottom of a blog navigates the user to the previous page
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

NOTE: The account I used for this test is @ JakePassi.

NOTE: Canary mode is turned on.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Go to one of your own blogs.
2. Press the globe icon at the bottom.

### Platform information

iPhone SE / iOS 12.1.4

### App version

iOS app (Version 3.3.0)

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Pressing the globe icon at the bottom of a blog navigates the user to the previous page in the iOS app.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Pressing the globe icon at the bottom of a blog should allow the user to translate the blog into another language. Unless it's the license icon. If so, then pressing it shouldn't do anything and should say which license is attached to the blog.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: Comment edit controls disappeared
description:
## Summary

The controls to edit and report comments are disappeared on latest testflight release

### Steps to reproduce

try to edit a comment

### Platform information

ios mobile

### App version

testflight 3.4.0 (201904060001)

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

when you tap the comment to expose the edit menu, only a copy dialogue appears

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

when you tap the comment, edit, translate and report controls should appear 

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

When a user tries to access their gallery for the first time, they are sometimes met with a critical error.

### Steps to reproduce

* Reset permissions or reinstall app
* Try to access your gallery (post attachment is probably the easiest way)

### Platform information 

S7 Edge (8.0.0) / app v3.3.0

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

User is shown a critical error

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

User should be prompted for permission for the app to access gallery

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![Wire_2019-04-02_at_20.44.31](/uploads/2bae4c3abfa389269ba65513cdee36a4/Wire_2019-04-02_at_20.44.31.jpeg)

![Wire_2019-04-02_at_20.44.35](/uploads/023c7eccc52fb4dd775a0f557dc30ea1/Wire_2019-04-02_at_20.44.35.jpeg)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

description:

### Summary

Users cannot see their own paywalled content on mobile app.

### Steps to reproduce

o Upload a new post with a paywall.
o Look at the image in your feed.

### Platform information 

Replicated on S7 edge on 8.0.0.

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

User cannot view their content.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

A user should be able to see their own pay-walled content.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/956732480210944000

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: (bug): Can't copy/paste text in post input
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

Trying to copy text when inputting a post does not work on Android.

### Steps to reproduce

* Create new post.
* Type text.
* Try to highlight the text by long pressing.
* No native action menu appears to copy, paste etc

### Platform information

S7 edge 8.0.0

### App version

v3.3.0

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Cannot copy text or paste text.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Should be able to highlight, copy, paste - any of the standard actions a user would expect.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: (bug): Trim white-space on username input
description: It'd be ideal if we trimmed white space on the username input. I'm constantly running into annoyances with it, when im rushing to log in, so I would presume at-least some users do this too.

title: (bug): User cannot make wallet password
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

A new user cannot make a password for my wallet. Every time a key pressed an error is displayed; after this the button to continue doesn't work.

### Steps to reproduce

(How one can reproduce the issue - this is very important)

### Platform information

(Device, Android/iOS version, system stats, screen size)

### App version

(App version and build number)

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Every time the user presses a key when setting up a wallet (password) they get the below error.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

User should be able to create their wallet.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

https://www.minds.com/media/955557308309028864

![xlarge](/uploads/4865db91fb613146bc0dd1eaf0231883/xlarge.jpeg)

### Possible fixes

Without looking at the code, its probably a catch with e as a parameter, where the app is running and looking for a variable err. Something like that. Seems to happen on the keyDown event.

/label ~"T \- Bug" ~"S \- Triage:new"

App is hanging on load screen when opened out of cold storage
description:
### Summary

When logging into the app from cold storage, it hangs on the load screen and does not open.

### Steps to reproduce

Close app out of memory (restart device) and open the app (it doesn't happen every time but has been confirmed by multiple admins)

### Platform information 

Android, Galaxy S9 v.9
Galaxy Note 8 v.8.0.0

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Load screen locks on lighbulb

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

App should load as normal

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

(bug): No more than 5 hashtags on Mobile for add and edit post
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

Users can still post more than 5 hashtags on mobile, not matching the front-site. Note this needs to be done for edit too - else a user can bypass it altogether, just adding tags in after. Ideally an error should be shown.

### Steps to reproduce
Add:
* Create a post with more than 5 hashtags
* Save it and see

Edit:
* Create a post with 5 hashtags
* Edit it
* Add another hashtag
* Save 

### Platform information 

iOS and Android 

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

The user can have more than 5 hashtags on a post

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

The user should NOT be allowed to add a post with, or edit a post so that there are more than 5 hashtags, ideally an error should show to indicate why the user cannot post.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

Links sent in mobile messenger open in web app and not mobile app
description:
### Summary

If you receive a Minds link in messenger on mobile and click on it, the url opens in the web app and not mobile. If the user is not logged in to the web app, page cannot be found error displays as logged out user cannot view minds pages

### Steps to reproduce

Message a minds link in app and then open it.

### Platform

iOS mobile

### App version

TestFlight 3.3.0 (201903130001)

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Link opens in web app and not mobile

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Link should open in mobile app

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: Videos will not play in groups
description:
You can post a video to a group, but it will not play)

### Steps to reproduce

Try to play this video
https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/953061980350586880

Or try to upload a video into a group

### Platform information

IOS mobile

### what is app release?

TestFlight 3.3.0 (201903130001)

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Video goes white screen when play button is pressed. Happens with Remind and native post. Only mobile app, web app is ok.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Video goes white screen and does not play

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots
![6E694B28-EBA2-41C0-B265-AA664C0DD855](/uploads/9599a41ebff8c264ea692abfb7aed45c/6E694B28-EBA2-41C0-B265-AA664C0DD855.png)

Error when tapping on an image in the discovery gallery and then returning to the gallery

error is displayed

### What should happen?
